statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, item_id FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT item_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE item_id = 3 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, item_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, item_id FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE item_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY customer_id ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items_purchased FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_items_purchased > 3 ORDER BY total_items_purchased DESC;
SELECT customer_id, item_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items_purchased FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_items_purchased DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE amount > 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31');
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT c.name, c.email, ph.amount FROM customers c JOIN purchase_history ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.product_category = 'Clothing';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '95c717e6-389d-4bb0-9ad3-564837e5d728';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100.00 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT product_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount < 1000
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, p.category, p.price, od.quantity FROM Products p JOIN OrderDetails od ON p.product_id = od.product_id WHERE od.order_id = 101;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, r.recommended_product_id FROM Customers c JOIN Recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN Products p ON r.recommended_product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.product_category = c.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id

SELECT customer_name, product_name, category_name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id JOIN categories ON products.product_category = categories.category_name
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01'
